remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的抽象基类和，其字符写入流和字符串，分别。 is the abstract base class of and , which write characters to streams and strings, respectively. 创建的实例若要向字符串写入一个对象，请将字符串写入到一个文件，或要序列化 XML。Create an instance of to write an object to a string, write strings to a file, or to serialize XML. 此外可以使用的实例将文本写入使用相同的 Api 可以使用一个字符串或流，实现一个自定义后备存储，或若要添加设置文本格式的支持。You can also use an instance of to write text to a custom backing store using the same APIs you would use for a string or a stream, or to add support for text formatting. 所有`Write`方法的将基元数据类型作为参数写出以字符串形式的值。All the `Write` methods of having primitive data types as parameters write out the values as strings. 默认情况下，不是线程安全。By default, a is not thread safe. 请参阅为线程安全包装。See for a thread-safe wrapper. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 完成后使用从此类型派生的任何类型的操作后，您应释放它直接或间接。When you have finished using any type that derives from this type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 Dispose 和中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see Dispose and the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 类是抽象类。The class is an abstract class. 因此，您实例化它在代码中。Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code. 类派生自并提供用于向流写入的成员的实现。The class derives from and provides implementations of the members for writing to a stream. 下面的示例演示如何编写两个行构成的字符串值到文本文件使用方法。The following example shows how to write two lines that consist of string values to a text file by using the method. 若要提供派生类中重写 DisposeOverride Dispose in a derived class to provide [!code-csharp[System.IO.StreamWriter#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StreamWriter/CS/example23.cs#23)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StreamWriter#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StreamWriter/VB/example23.vb#23)]

summary.span: 关闭当前编写器并释放任何与该编写器关联的系统资源。

span.span: Closes the current writer and releases any system resources associated with the writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现`Close`调用方法并将其传递`true`值。This implementation of `Close` calls the method and passes it a `true` value. 除非显式调用，刷新该流不会刷新其基础编码器或`Close`。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call or `Close`. 设置属性设置为`true`意味着数据从缓冲区刷新到流中，但编码器状态不会进行刷新。Setting the property to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这将允许编码器，以便它可以正确编码的字符的下一步块保持其状态 （部分字符）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 这种情况下会影响 UTF8，UTF7 其中某些字符可以仅后在编码器收到的相邻字符编码。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can be encoded only after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. > [!NOTE] > 在派生类中，不会重写方法。In derived classes, do not override the method. 相反，重写方法添加代码以释放资源。Instead, override the method to add code for releasing resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). **请注意**始终为调用发布到最后一个引用之前。**Note** Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。重写此方法时, 请小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。有关如何实现此方法的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding this method, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此默认方法不执行任何操作，但派生的类可以重写该方法以提供适当的功能。This default method does nothing, but derived classes can override the method to provide the appropriate functionality. 除非显式调用，刷新该流不会刷新其基础编码器`Flush`或。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call `Flush` or . 设置到`true`意味着数据从缓冲区刷新到流中，但编码器状态不会进行刷新。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这将允许编码器，以便它可以正确编码的字符的下一步块保持其状态 （部分字符）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 这种情况下会影响 UTF8，UTF7 其中某些字符仅后才能进行编码的编码器收到的相邻字符。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性指定在调用时使用特定于区域性的格式设置和方法。The value of the property specifies the culture-specific formatting that is used when you call the and methods. 如果您不想要提供的格式提供程序，可以通过使用创建实例构造函数中，这会设置属性设置为`null`。If you do not want to provide a format provider, you create an instance by using the constructor, which sets the property to `null`. 当属性包含`null`，当前线程的区域性用于格式设置。When the property contains `null`, the culture of the current thread is used for formatting. 创建文件和文本写入文件的示例，请参阅[如何： 将文本写入到文件](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)。For an example of creating a file and writing text to a file, see [How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md). 从文件读取文本的示例，请参阅[如何： 从文件读取文本](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)。For an example of reading text from a file, see [How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md). 读取和写入二进制文件的示例，请参阅[如何： 读取和写入到新创建的数据文件](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)。For an example of reading from and writing to a binary file, see [How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md). 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用复合格式设置将对象的值转换为其字符串表示形式，并将字符串中嵌入该表示形式。This method uses composite formatting to convert the value of an object to its string representation and to embed that representation in a string. .NET 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍：.NET provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关复合格式设置功能的详细信息，请参阅[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the composite formatting feature, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关日期和时间格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)并[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about date and time format specifiers, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). - 有关枚举格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[枚举格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). `format`参数由零个或多个文本序列与零个或多个索引占位符称为格式项，对应于此方法的参数列表中的对象。The `format` parameter consists of zero or more runs of text intermixed with zero or more indexed placeholders, called format items, that correspond to an object in the parameter list of this method. 格式设置过程将每个格式项替换相应的对象的值的字符串表示形式。The formatting process replaces each format item with the string representation of the value of the corresponding object. 格式项的语法如下所示：The syntax of a format item is as follows: {*索引*[，*长度*] [:*formatString*]}{*index*[,*length*][:*formatString*]} 括号中的元素是可选的。Elements in square brackets are optional. 下表对每个元素进行了描述。The following table describes each element. 有关复合格式设置功能，包括格式项的语法的详细信息请参阅[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the composite formatting feature, including the syntax of a format item, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |Index — 索引index|参数列表中要进行格式化的对象的从零开始位置。The zero-based position in the parameter list of the object to be formatted. 如果指定的对象*索引*是`null`，格式项都替换为。If the object specified by *index* is `null`, the format item is replaced by . 因为此重载具有单个对象在其参数中列出，值*索引*必须始终为 0。Because this overload has only a single object in its parameter list, the value of *index* must always be 0. 如果在没有参数*索引*位置，引发。If there is no parameter in the *index* position, a is thrown.| |*长度*,*length*|最小参数的字符串表示形式中的字符数。The minimum number of characters in the string representation of the parameter. 如果为正数，该参数为右对齐;如果为负数，它是左对齐。If positive, the parameter is right-aligned; if negative, it is left-aligned.| |:*格式字符串*:*formatString*|支持要设置格式的对象的一个标准或自定义格式字符串。A standard or custom format string that is supported by the object to be formatted. 可能的值*formatString*支持的对象的值相同`ToString(string format)`方法。Possible values for *formatString* are the same as the values supported by the object's `ToString(string format)` method. 如果*formatString*未指定，并要进行格式化的对象实现接口，`null`作为值传递`format`参数用作格式字符串。If *formatString* is not specified and the object to be formatted implements the interface, `null` is passed as the value of the `format` parameter that is used as the format string.| 前导空格和尾随大括号字符，"{"和"}"，所需。The leading and trailing brace characters, "{" and "}", are required. 若要指定中的单个大括号字符`format`、 指定两个前导或尾随大括号字符; 即，"{{"或"}}"。To specify a single literal brace character in `format`, specify two leading or trailing brace characters; that is, "{{" or "}}". .. 此方法不会不搜索指定的字符串中的单个换行符字符 (十六进制 0x000a)，并将其替换为。This method does not search the specified string for individual newline characters (hexadecimal 0x000a) and replace them with . 如果指定的对象不引用在格式字符串中，将忽略它。If a specified object is not referenced in the format string, it is ignored. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用复合格式设置将对象的值转换为其字符串表示形式，并将字符串中嵌入该表示形式。This method uses composite formatting to convert the value of an object to its string representation and to embed that representation in a string. .NET 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍：.NET provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关复合格式设置功能的详细信息，请参阅[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the composite formatting feature, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). - numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). - 有关枚举格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[枚举格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). `format`参数由零个或多个文本序列与零个或多个索引占位符称为格式项，对应于此方法的参数列表中的对象。The `format` parameter consists of zero span.span: Writes a formatted string and a new line to the text string or stream, using the same semantics as the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用复合格式设置将对象的值转换为其字符串表示形式，并将字符串中嵌入该表示形式。This method uses composite formatting to convert the value of an object to its string representation and to embed that representation in a string. .NET 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍：.NET provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关复合格式设置功能的详细信息，请参阅[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the composite formatting feature, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关日期和时间格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)并[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about date and time format specifiers, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). - 有关枚举格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[枚举格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). `format`参数由零个或多个文本序列与零个或多个索引占位符称为格式项，对应于此方法的参数列表中的对象。The `format` parameter consists of zero or more runs of text intermixed with zero or more indexed placeholders, called format items, that correspond to an object in the parameter list of this method. 格式设置过程将每个格式项替换相应的对象的值的字符串表示形式。The formatting process replaces each format item with the string representation of the value of the corresponding object. 格式项的语法如下所示：The syntax of a format item is as follows: {*索引*[，*长度*] [:*formatString*]}{*index*[,*length*][:*formatString*]} 括号中的元素是可选的。Elements in square brackets are optional. 下表对每个元素进行了描述。The following table describes each element. 有关复合格式设置功能，包括格式项的语法的详细信息请参阅[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the composite formatting feature, including the syntax of a format item, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |Index — 索引index|参数列表中要进行格式化的对象的从零开始位置。The zero-based position in the parameter list of the object to be formatted. 如果指定的对象*索引*是`null`，格式项都替换为。If the object specified by *index* is `null`, the format item is replaced by . 因为此重载具有单个对象在其参数中列出，值*索引*必须始终为 0。Because this overload has only a single object in its parameter list, the value of *index* must always be 0. 如果在没有参数*索引*位置，引发。If there is no parameter in the *index* position, a is thrown.| |*长度*,*length*|最小参数的字符串表示形式中的字符数。The minimum number of characters in the string representation of the parameter. 如果为正数，该参数为右对齐;如果为负数，它是左对齐。If positive, the parameter is right-aligned; if negative, it is left-aligned.| |:*格式字符串*:*formatString*|支持要设置格式的对象的一个标准或自定义格式字符串。A standard or custom format string that is supported by the object to be formatted. 可能的值*formatString*支持的对象的值相同`ToString(string format)`方法。Possible values for *formatString* are the same as the values supported by the object's `ToString(string format)` method. 如果*formatString*未指定，并要进行格式化的对象实现接口，`null`作为值传递`format`参数用作格式字符串。If *formatString* is not specified and the object to be formatted implements the interface, `null` is passed as the value of the `format` parameter that is used as the format string.| 前导空格和尾随大括号字符，"{"和"}"，所需。The leading and trailing brace characters, "{" and "}", are required. 若要指定中的单个大括号字符`format`、 指定两个前导或尾随大括号字符; 即，"{{"或"}}"。To specify a single literal brace character in `format`, specify two leading or trailing brace characters; that is, "{{" or "}}". 此方法不会不搜索指定的字符串中的单个换行符字符 (十六进制 0x000a)，并将其替换为。This method does not search the specified string for individual newline characters (hexadecimal 0x000a) and replace them with . 如果指定的对象不引用在格式字符串中，将忽略它。If a specified object is not referenced in the format string, it is ignored. 定义行终止符字段。The line terminator is defined by the field. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用复合格式设置将对象的值转换为其字符串表示形式，并将字符串中嵌入该表示形式。This method uses composite formatting to convert the value of an object to its string representation and to embed that representation in a string. .NET 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍：.NET provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关复合格式设置功能的详细信息，请参阅[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the composite formatting feature, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关日期和时间格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)并[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about date and time format specifiers, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). - 有关枚举格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[枚举格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). `format`参数由零个或多个文本序列与零个或多个索引占位符称为格式项，对应于此方法的参数列表中的对象。The `format` parameter consists of zero or more runs of text intermixed with zero or more indexed placeholders, called format items, that correspond to an object in the parameter list of this method. 格式设置过程将每个格式项替换相应的对象的值的字符串表示形式。The formatting process replaces each format item with the string representation of the value of the corresponding object. 格式项的语法如下所示：The syntax of a format item is as follows: {*索引*[，*长度*] [:*formatString*]}{*index*[,*length*][:*formatString*]} 括号中的元素是可选的。Elements in square brackets are optional. 下表对每个元素进行了描述。The following table describes each element. 有关复合格式设置功能，包括格式项的语法的详细信息请参阅[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the composite formatting feature, including the syntax of a format item, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |Index — 索引index|参数列表中要进行格式化的对象的从零开始位置。The zero-based position in the parameter list of the object to be formatted. 如果指定的对象*索引*是`null`，格式项都替换为。If the object specified by *index* is `null`, the format item is replaced by . 因为此重载具有一个数组，其参数中列出，值*索引*必须始终为数组的长度小于。Because this overload has an array in its parameter list, the value of *index* must always be less than the length of the array. 如果在没有参数*索引*位置，引发。If there is no parameter in the *index* position, a is thrown.| |*长度*,*length*|最小参数的字符串表示形式中的字符数。The minimum number of characters in the string representation of the parameter. 如果为正数，该参数为右对齐;如果为负数，它是左对齐。If positive, the parameter is right-aligned; if negative, it is left-aligned.| |:*格式字符串*:*formatString*|支持要设置格式的对象的一个标准或自定义格式字符串。A standard or custom format string that is supported by the object to be formatted. 可能的值*formatString*支持的对象的值相同`ToString(string format)`方法。Possible values for *formatString* are the same as the values supported by the object's `ToString(string format)` method. 如果*formatString*未指定，并要进行格式化的对象实现接口，`null`作为值传递`format`参数用作格式字符串。If *formatString* is not specified and the object to be formatted implements the interface, `null` is passed as the value of the `format` parameter that is used as the format string.| 前导空格和尾随大括号字符，"{"和"}"，所需。The leading and trailing brace characters, "{" and "}", are required. 若要指定中的单个大括号字符`format`、 指定两个前导或尾随大括号字符; 即，"{{"或"}}"。To specify a single literal brace character in `format`, specify two leading or trailing brace characters; that is, "{{" or "}}". 此方法不会不搜索指定的字符串中的单个换行符字符 (十六进制 0x000a)，并将其替换为。This method does not search the specified string for individual newline characters (hexadecimal 0x000a) and replace them with . 如果指定的对象不引用在格式字符串中，将忽略它。If a specified object is not referenced in the format string, it is ignored. 定义行终止符字段。The line terminator is defined by the field. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
